entry.title: Spark Files
entry.summary:
Author: PlotWitch

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 9,288Chapters: 10/?Kudos: 8

Summary: This is going to be a massive dump file for all of the outlines and ideas I've had over the years for Teen Wolf. I intend to have as many fully outlined as possible, and plan on encouraging some adoption. Fair warning, Sterek loyalist, possibly Scott bashing, and the Sheriff's name is John. Anything that's fully outlined will have a full synopsis if one exists.

entry.title: How to colossally fuck shit up
entry.summary:
Author: Cashewchococake

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 26,759Chapters: 15/?Kudos: 92

Summary: Derek is brought back to life by our favorite FBI-agent, Stiles Stilinski.They have sex and Derek gets pregnant.A story about Derek and Stiles building their family and trying to find their way to each other.orStiles was looking at him expectedly.Derek took a deep breath and prepared himself for the upcoming words. “But I wasn’t the only one he smelled like, Stiles.”He looked pleadingly at Stiles, who'd gone deathly pale, and was now shaking his head.“Stiles-, Eli is your son.” Derek forced out.Stiles let out a small breathless sound of “Oh!”He shot up from the couch and took his head between his hands, pulling his hair.When that didn’t help to quiet the raging flood of questions in his head, he started pacing.“What? -I mean…how? How is that even possible?""Why the hell would you keep that from me?” He was spluttering.Stiles couldn’t believe what he was hearing. Why would Derek do that?

entry.title: COMPANION HEARTS
entry.summary:
Author: knox_rivers

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 18,216Chapters: 4/4Kudos: 1

Summary: In a world where fate is bound by magic and blood, the young Lord Stilinski is a noble with latent magical abilities who gets claimed by the royal Derek Hale, a powerful shifter prince, through the ancient Law of Surprise. Derek, thrusted into his kingdom’s throne after covert assassins devastate his castle, must produce an heir to secure his claim. To his surprise he didn't expect the only Stilinski heir to be male, thwarting his plans to ascend to King. Though their connection is unexpected, it soon becomes undeniable as destiny intertwines them.

entry.title: you were raised by wolves and voice (every night, i hear them howling)
entry.summary:
Author: Anonymous

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 9,364Chapters: 1/30Kudos: 2

Summary: Derek tips his head towards the heavens, dragging a rough palm over his face. “So I'm on babysitting duty. You're putting me on babysitting duty.” “I'm eighteen,” Stiles mumbles, scowling and petulant. Derek doesn't even look at him. “The training of an emissary is integral to the pack bond,” Deaton retorts. “To many, it is sacred, the connection between Alpha and emissary. You should treat it as an honour, Alpha Hale.” “Yeah, I feel real honoured,” Derek deadpans, sarcasm dripping from his dulcet tone. Deaton simply shakes his head with a sigh. ______ In which, post-3B, Derek doesn't get captured and instead travels. Finding himself faced with an Alpha Pack allied with a Witches' Coven on the hunt for the True Alpha, he returns to Beacon Hills to warn Scott of the threat. He's tasked with overseeing the new emissary's training, which just so happens to be Stiles. It's a test of patience for the both of them.

entry.title: A Wish Worth Granting
entry.summary:
Author: QandnoA

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 31,074Chapters: 5/?Kudos: 64

Summary: Many genies are cruel. Twisted. Bastards, even. They laugh at the misery of others. They revel in it.A few are simply neutral—neither cruel nor kind. They just heed the words of the wish-maker, grant it, and then they're gone. Sometimes the wishes are good. Sometimes the wishes turn out horrible. But they’re never around long enough to find out. Maybe that’s a gift. Maybe it’s a curse. No one can really know for sure.And then, there are the rarest ones of all. The ones that were never really meant to exist. The ones that are kind.They take the time to listen. To observe. To really take in all the events going around the wish-maker, both past and present. And what makes them the scariest of all genies… They’re the only ones that can ignore.They can ignore wishes, big or small. And there are no records of their limits—how many times they can ignore, how many wishes they can grant.The most mysterious. The most powerful. The most terrifying genies.They are known as the kindest you will ever find.- OR -The one where Stiles accidentally makes a wish to a genie and shenanigans ensue.

entry.title: Sommelier
entry.summary:
Author: Bilinski_stiles_stilinski

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 7,300Chapters: 3/?Kudos: 74

Summary: So apparently Derek has a soft side. How does Stiles know this? Well, because Stiles knows everything. How? Because Stiles cant seem to keep his big f******* head out of places he really shouldn't be so could anyone really blame him when he found himself trapped under 220 pounds of pure muscle? No....no not really. It's kind of just how the universe has been set up for him lately.-----Under all the brooding half-lidded gestures Derek makes about 5k times a day, is a very small sliver of space where he occasionally rolls over to show the soft underbelly of his being. WINE! WINE of all things. Stiles really wants Derek to feel okay with showing this side of himself more often but without boundaries or barriers, Stiles is likely to mess up his only chance. So naturally, he does.

entry.title: No Graves for the Forgotten
entry.summary:
Author: am0ra

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 14,814Chapters: 3/?Kudos: 14

Summary: He’s the face behind the throne.The ghost of a golden palace.The man married to the monster who destroyed everything.Stiles Stilinski has learned how to disappear in plain sight — with soft lips, dangerous eyes, and a body trained to please, not to feel.Derek Hale should hate him.But everything about Stiles is a provocation: the low voice, the crooked smile, the whispered secrets in the shadows of rebellion.They meet by accident.Then, by necessity.Soon, by desire.But Stiles carries secrets that could bring empires down — and an emptiness only Derek seems to see.In a world where love is a weapon and loyalty is a convenient lie, some sparks don’t fade.They burn everything in their path.
